ygData.subject: Re: Handmade backpacks *spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/99 8:58:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Handmade backpacks are.. High Quality Bearskin, Backpack patern, in a LARGE sewing kit.  You
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/99 8:58:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
chpicker@... writes:

> Where do you find handmade backpacks? Or more to the point, how do you
> MAKE them? After spending a ridiculous amount of time and money searching
> for the answer and experimenting with combinations that don't work, neither
> I nor any guild member have been able to figure out how to tailor a
> Backpack. If I read into your message correctly, the tailored backpacks
> have 10 slots instead of the standard 8? That answers the long-asked
> question of why backpack patterns are more expensive than backpacks.
>
> I realize this is a bit off-topic, but I have seen mention of handmade
> backpacks NOWHERE else. And no one else seems to have a clue.
>
Handmade backpacks are..
High Quality Bearskin, Backpack patern, in a LARGE sewing kit. You need a
skill of maybee 35 to do it with good success. (I have someone with a 27 who
has made about 4 out of 10 pelts...)

Good luck finding the HQ bearskins. I have been looking for them for 3 weeks
with little luck. Slaughtering no learning bears, young kodiaks and Kodiaks.
got 1 in all that time.

Sonoroud tomebinder.
